name: ai-counseling-system
description: AI-powered counseling system with secure authentication and real-time chat

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-counseling-app && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:app"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:app
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
